testcase.classname: Create of new cards with joker and with or without joker
testcase.name: 1 Create of new cards with valid end point
testcase.system-out: Given the api are up and runnig for "https://deckofcardsapi.com/api/deck/new/".passed When A user perform post request "http://deckofcardsapi.com/api/deck/new/"..passed Then user receives 200 response.............................................passed Then Validate the response body for the "New" remaing value 52..............passed

testcase.classname: Draw one or more cards from the avaible deck
testcase.name: 1 Create of new cards with valid end point
testcase.system-out: Given the api are up and runnig for "https://deckofcardsapi.com/api/deck/new/".passed When A user perform post request "http://deckofcardsapi.com/api/deck/new/"..passed And count of deck is "52"...................................................passed Then Draw the 0 cards from the avaible deck_id by postrequest...............passed And verify response code 200................................................passed Then Validate the response body for the "Drawncard" remaing value 52........passed

testcase.classname: Draw one or more cards from the avaible deck
testcase.name: 2 draw the deck count is 4
testcase.system-out: Given Get the reaming count of the deck.....................................passed Then Draw the 4 cards from the avaible deck_id by postrequest...............passed And verify response code 200................................................passed Then Validate the response body for the "Drawncard" remaing value 48........passed
